intro.p: The US Army wants to get an idea of how Americans feel about the current conflict in Ukraine. In order to get the information, the Army partnered with Quinnipiac University to randomly send a survey to 950 Army Officers living at Fort Bragg. Survey respondents completed the survey online using a code provided in the invitation. The survey was available in English.

Survey respondents were asked to decide to what degree they agreed with the following statements. The possible answer were "Strongly Agree", "Agree", "Neither Agree or Disagree", "Disagree", "Strongly Disagree".

item.p: Russia needs to be punished for its evil actions taken to completely destroy the lives of Ukrainian citizens.
The people responsible for the US military response to the conflict are extremely cowardly not to put the extraordinary US military in the field against the Russians.
